Html:
Hi,

I'm just trying to wrap my head around what these libraries provide and playing with the sample app I didn't see a way to ensure lines only run vertically or horizontally.  Is there a way I can do this programmatically?  Or is this a feature not supported yet?  It would seem that it would effect how nodes are laid out, since right now sometimes they don't line up perfectly, when if they did it there would be more, nice, parallel lines.

Thanks for the help!
